alert.note: Alert for Moses Lake Area; Upper Columbia Basin (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 3:13PM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Adams and southwestern Lincoln Counties through 345 PM PDT... At 313 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 16 miles southwest of Ritzville, or 24 miles north of Connell, moving north at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ritzville, Lind, Washtucna, Hatton, Marcellus, Batum, Schrag, Packard, Schoonover, Beatrice, Paha, Ralston, Pizzro, Cunningham, and Jantz. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 in Washington between mile markers 196 and 224. U.S. Highway 395 in Washington between mile markers 62 and 96. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Moses Lake Area; Upper Columbia Basin
